data.text: ‘The Town Musicians of Bremen’ never made it to the city in Grimm’s fairytale, but a statue can be found near the city hall. #TravelTuesday

Built by Charlemagne in 796 the Aachen Cathedral is the oldest cathedral in northern Europe. #TravelTuesday
The Wuppertal Suspension Railway is famous for Tuffi. The elephant jumped out of it in 1950 and landed safely in the Wupper. #TravelTuesday
‘Zeche Zollverein’ was a coal mine industrial complex from 1851 to 1986. In summer there’s an outdoor swimming pool. #TravelTuesday
